changes.description: Dynamic properties are deprecated (must use #[AllowDynamicProperties] attribute)
changes.description_ja: 動的プロパティが非推奨（#[AllowDynamicProperties]属性が必要）

changes.description: Calling get_class() without arguments is deprecated
changes.description_ja: 引数なしの get_class() 呼び出しが非推奨

changes.description: Calling get_parent_class() without arguments is deprecated
changes.description_ja: 引数なしの get_parent_class() 呼び出しが非推奨

changes.description: mb_strimwidth() behavior change - width calculation now uses grapheme clusters
changes.description_ja: mb_strimwidth() の動作変更 - 幅計算がグラフェムクラスタを使用

changes.description: Using "static" in a non-static context is deprecated
changes.description_ja: 非静的コンテキストでの static の使用が非推奨
changes.replacement: Use self:: or $this in non-static context

changes.description: array_sum() and array_product() now emit warnings for non-numeric values
changes.description_ja: array_sum() と array_product() が非数値で警告を出力
changes.replacement: Ensure array contains only numeric values

changes.description: range() function is stricter with type coercion
changes.description_ja: range() 関数の型変換が厳格化
changes.replacement: Ensure proper types are passed to range()

changes.description: New json_validate() function for validating JSON strings
changes.description_ja: 新しい json_validate() 関数でJSONの検証が可能

changes.description: Typed class constants are now supported
changes.description_ja: 型付きクラス定数がサポート
オーバーライドメソッドを示す #[Override] 属性
